content:
I'm a highly skilled Web Developer with over 5 years of experience building modern, scalable web applications. I have a strong foundation in both front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and back-end technologies (Node.js, PHP, MySQL), and I'm proficient with JavaScript frameworks like React and Vue.js. I'm comfortable with version control systems like Git and I have experience managing and maintaining infrastructure, including Amazon Web Services.

I'm comfortable and experienced in liaising with clients and customers and I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Psychology, which can give me a unique perspective on user needs.

I consider myself to be a lifelong learner, always looking for new ways to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices. The Technology Radar being a great source of inspiration in this regard.

Iï»¿n my spare time I like to watch films, television shows or partake in gaming sessions with friends, usually over Discord. We often like to play competitive games, such as League of Legends, or cooperative games, like Diablo. 

When I'm not spending time with my friends I channel my creativity by exploring new technologies and brainstorming potential concepts for new games.
